name: Worlds Beyond - Classic retro RPG about the end of the world
blurb: Worlds Beyond is a 2D RPG about the end of the world. The focus is on a unique sci-fi storyline and believable character writing.

rewards.reward: Every little bit helps! You\u2019ve just put your name in the credits of Worlds Beyond. In addition, you\u2019ll receive a special \u201cContributor\u201d badge on our forums.

Congrats on your pre-order of the digital version of Worlds Beyond! We\u2019ll also put your name in our credits, and Josiah will mention you in his letter of resignation at his kitchen job as one of his reasons for leaving. You are helping us achieve our dream, after all! Also includes the $5 tier reward.

You\u2019ll get a high-quality digital copy of the game\u2019s soundtrack on release, which you\u2019ll also be able to drop into one of the game\u2019s content directories to improve the game\u2019s audio quality to audiophile levels. Also includes the $5 and $10 tier rewards.

We really appreciate your generosity! For this donation, you get to design your own NPC (Non-Player Character) which we\u2019ll put either in a town designed specifically for Kickstarter supporters, or somewhere else in the game world. Josiah will create your NPC\u2019s custom sprite and you get to write your own line(s) of dialog! We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards.

Same as the previous reward, except it comes with a special bonus -- Josiah will create a custom character portrait, displayed in dialog with your NPC, based on your own face! Clear, neutral expression photograph of your face required for reference. We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards.
Receive a limited-edition Bridge Unit Orzo shirt! Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards. Includes $100 tier if available.

You get to design one of the game\u2019s common monsters! You design the look of the monster, either through text description or concept artwork, and we\u2019ll create the in-game sprites based on your design and bring it to life! We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards.
You\u2019ll get to play the game early, in its beta form, and help us test Worlds Beyond as part of our Beta Testing team! Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards.

For this level of generosity, you deserve a little notoriety. You\u2019ll become either the shopkeeper or innkeeper of our town for Kickstarter supporters, complete with your own custom dialog portrait based on your face (Optional). Clear, neutral expression photograph of your face required for reference if portrait is desired. First come first serve to choose between inn and shop keeper! We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards. Includes $120 tier if available.

You get to design one of the game\u2019s boss monsters! (Due to the story already being mapped out, it will likely be fairly unconnected to major plot events) You design the look of the boss, either through text description or concept artwork, and we\u2019ll create the in-game sprites based on your design and bring it to life! We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards. Includes $100, $120 and $130 tier if available.

Receive a limited-edition cloth \u201cMap of the Known World\u201d featuring artwork of the world of the game. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards. Includes $100, $120 and $130 tier if available.

Congratulations on your promotion to Mayor! You get your own special NPC with custom portrait by Josiah (optional - Clear, neutral expression photograph of your face required for portrait reference), placed in a special town for Kickstarter supporters, plus you get to work with us to design the entire town. We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, and $25 tier rewards. Includes $120 and $130 tier if available.

Wow! You get to join us on the Bridge Unit Orzo team to design an entire sidequest storyline for Worlds Beyond, including events, characters, plot, and rewards. (To refrain from divulging main game story details, it must be fairly self-contained -- We will find a place to incorporate it)  We retain veto rights depending on content. Also includes the $5, $10, $25, and $100 tier rewards. Includes $120 and $130 tier if available.
